arStrings.szText: {c_important}Decompose{/c} can chain and burst up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional targets. Explosions from {c_important}Decompose{/c} deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
{c_important}Decompose{/c} chains to additional targets. Explosions from {c_important}Decompose{/c} deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
